Title: Relates to directing local government units providing services to individuals with mental illness or developmental disabilities to create a single point of access system
Summary: Directs local government units providing services to individuals with mental illness or developmental disabilities to create a single point of access system.
LawCode: Amd ยง41.13, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to directing local government units providing services to individuals with mental illness or developmental disabilities to create a single point of access system
